quotes.quote: A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
A diet should be named after what you do eat, not what you don't eat.
The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day you're off it.
Dieting is the only game where you win when you lose!
The best diet is the one that you don't know you are on.
At the end of every diet, the path curves back to the trough.
The first thing you lose on a diet is brain mass.
Probably nothing in the world arouses more false hopes than the first four hours of a diet.
The vegan diet is obviously lacking whatever essential nutrient it is that makes people likeable.
Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
The resolve to diet is most easily summoned on a full stomach.
Dieting is our last tie with asceticism.
Diets are for those who are thick and tired of it.
Dieting fooled you into thinking you could control your life.
The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
Diets are essentially training courses in how to feel fat and feel like a failure.
A diet is when you watch what you eat and wish you could eat what you watch.
The people who are scared of going on a diet are the people who could benefit the most from one.
It's one thing to lose weight, but it's another thing to eat healthy.
Start your diet during a period of optimism and happiness.
Diet is the essential key to all successful healing. Without a proper balanced diet, the effectiveness of herbal treatment is very limited.
Diet food is for lazy people.
Sometimes you need to go on a low-information diet.
Diets are a temporary solution to a permanent problem.
The most ethical diet just so happens to be the most environmentally sound diet and just so happens to be the healthiest.
